item.title: Testing features in `blogdown`
item.description: This is a post to test the functionality of blogdown. We are going to look at how various types of outputs are rendered and do some tweaking to get things to work right. The hope is to get an idea of what the best practices for creating posts and pages is when working with this software. Tables Here’s some more code working with tables with different functions.
